Description.Text: General information:Part of the Stil Group of hotels, the Hotel Delfin Azul is situated close to the centre of the resort of Alcudia on the north coast of Majorca, approximately 60km north of the capital Palma and the Son Sant Joan International airport. The hotel is a short walk from the resort centre with its selection of bars, restaurants, shops and nightlife, and around 200 metres from the wide sandy Alcudia beach.Built in 1975 and completely refurbished during the winter of 2006 to include the installation of air conditioning in all public areas, the Hotel Delfin Azul has a total of 270 guest rooms, including 243 double rooms and 27 singles that are built over 6 floors and set amidst 1,700m2 of well kept Mediterranean style gardens and sun terraces.Location:The Stil Delfin Azul Hotel is located in the port of Alcudia, only 200 metres from the heavenly Alcudia beach, in an area that offers a wide range of facilities like banks, shops, bars, restaurants, supermarkets, etc.Area:The original walled Old Town of Alcúdia is well worth a visit for its reconstructed medieval streets and Roman remains. By contrast the resort area is thoroughly modern with high-rise hotels and tourist shops around the bay. The beach is one of Mallorca’s biggest (15 kilometres) and best, with various water sports on offer. To escape the crowds visit the adjacent S’Albufera nature reserve. Recreation:There are two marvellous gardens and a large terrace. For your entertainment, we offer a wide outdoor swimming pool for adults and children, play park, modern kindergarten, TV room, video games room, pool table, etc. Day and night you will be able to enjoy a wide program of activities and the best and more varied professional shows.Terrace with bar and snack-bar service. A spacious air-conditioned dining room in which our Chef’s two extensive buffets for children and adults delight our guests with its marvellous and varied selection of menus. Weekly guests are treated to our popular and recognised themed nights. Rooms:This six-floor hotel features 270 guestrooms, all of which are decorated in a modern style with tiled floors, and open onto balconies. the rooms include standard amenities.
Modern hotel with landscaped gardens located in the port of Alcudia, 200 metres from the beach, 1.5 kilometres from Pollentia.
